about_the_game:
“The Grandfather” short film is a 5 minute animatic with every comic book page from the game that tells the full story from the game, and it is fully narrated.

*This DLC comes with all 7 comic book pages from the game as desktop wallpaper for your PC*

The short film and wallpapers will be placed in your The Grandfather folder in the Steam Directory: …\Steam\SteamApps\common\The Grandfather[/i]
